cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.7)
set(Boost_USE_STATIC_LIBS ON)

# Do NOT edit this file (unless you know CMake; but there's no reason to!!)

project (AwwGeezManTester)
enable_testing()

set ( tester_sources
	AwwGeezMan_tests.cpp )

set (morty_library_files
	../src/Morty.cpp
	../src/Morty.hpp )
	
# indicates the location of the boost installation tree.
# hard-coded for our simple example.
set(BOOST_INCLUDE_DIRS $boost_installation_prefix/include)
find_package(Boost COMPONENTS filesystem system unit_test_framework REQUIRED)
include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS})

# Add the executable for the student's code to be tested in pytest framework
add_executable(AwwGeezManTester ${tester_sources} ${morty_library_files})
# indicates the include paths
target_include_directories(AwwGeezManTester PRIVATE ${BOOST_INCLUDE_DIRS})

# Set the C++ standards
set_target_properties(AwwGeezManTester PROPERTIES
    CXX_STANDARD 17
    CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON
    CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF
)

# declares a test with our executable with or without testing the extra credit
# option
add_definitions(-DEXTRA_CREDIT)
add_test(NAME AwwGeezHomeworkTester COMMAND AwwGeezManTester)
